reviews.title: A most excellent B&B experience
reviews.description: “Conchita and Moises open their doors to a total Mexican family experience, from the incredible breakfasts each morning sharing conversation and travel tips with the other guests, the comfortable rooms and relaxed seating areas in their beautiful home.”
